parameters.name: DiskId
parameters.description: The ID of the cloud disk that you want to query.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the [ISO 8601](~~25696~~) standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. If the value of seconds (ss) is not 00, the time is rounded up to the next minute.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The interval at which to retrieve the monitoring data. Unit: seconds. Valid values:

*   60
*   600
*   3600

Default value: 60.

>  Up to 400 monitoring data entries can be returned at a time. Make sure that the TotalCount value does not exceed 400. The value is calculated by using the following formula: TotalCount = (EndTime - StartTime)/Period.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the [ISO 8601](~~25696~~) standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. If the value of seconds (ss) is not 00, the time is rounded up to the next minute.

>  You can query the monitoring data in the last 30 days. If the value of `StartTime` is more than 30 days earlier than the current time, an error is returned.
